View Javadoc
1   package org.dayatang.cache.memcached;
2   
3   import org.dayatang.cache.Cache;
4   import org.junit.Test;
5   
6   import java.util.Date;
7   
8   import static org.junit.Assert.*;
9   
10  public class MemcachedBasedCacheTest {
11  
12      private Cache cache = createCache();
13  
14      private Cache createCache() {
15          MemcachedBasedCache result = new MemcachedBasedCache();
16          result.setServers("localhost:11211");
17          result.setInitConn(3);
18          result.setMinConn(3);
19          result.setMaxConn(5);
20          return result;
21      }
22  
23      @Test
24      public void notnull() {
25          assertNotNull(cache);
26      }
27  
28      @Test
29      public void get() {
30          Object obj = cache.get("hehe");
31          assertNull(obj);
32      }
33  
34      @Test
35      public void put() throws InterruptedException {
36          try {
37              Thread.sleep(1000);
38              Date now = new Date();
39              cache.put("time", now);
40              Date obj = (Date) cache.get("time");
41              assertNotNull(obj);
42              assertEquals(now, obj);
43          } catch (RuntimeException ex) {
44              System.err.println("出错了..." + ex);
45              throw ex;
46          }
47      }
48  
49      @Test
50      public void remove() {
51  
52          assertFalse(cache.remove("no-exist"));
53  
54          Date now = new Date();
55          cache.put("time", now);
56          boolean delete = cache.remove("time");
57          assertTrue(delete);
58  
59      }
60  
61      @Test
62      public void isKeyInCache() {
63  
64          assertFalse(cache.containsKey("no-exist"));
65  
66          Date now = new Date();
67          cache.put("time", now);
68          assertTrue(cache.containsKey("time"));
69  
70      }
71  }
